Company: University of Central Missouri Police Department (UCM)
Description of incident: After two documents containing student personal information were stolen, it was discovered that a former University police officer and his wife were responsible.  They used the names, Social Security numbers, and birth dates of students enrolled in 2005 and 2006 summer sessions.  The thieves fraudulently opened bank accounts, received student loans, and applied for credit and debit cards.  The losses total more than $30,000.
